name: Richard Luck
description: I just haven’t found “the one” yet and thats what I’m searching for. Someone to hold, to smile with, to love and cherish. Looking for that girl I can’t wait to see, to hear, to hold again. The one who makes the world fall away and there is only you and I. I enjoy nature and its beautiful scenery. I’m passionate and caring. I like to get dressed up, whether it be jeans and a collard shirt or a suit and tie just give me an excuse. I like to stay in the background and run things from behind but will step forward and take charge if need be. I’m a quiet guy with a loud voice. Am a guy with big personality and a subtle guy that doesn’t mind being not so subtle when appropriate. I feel I’m an interesting and outgoing guy that likes to go out and have a good time but also enjoys time at home relaxing. I love to go and explore new places and visit old favorites.i love traveling and all kinds of adventous I am very family oriented and am loyal, truth
